K01bsu011_u:2: ye ca te bodhisattvānāṃ trayaḥ śīlaskandhā uktāḥ /
K01bsu011_u:3: saṃvara śīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca teṣu śikṣitukāmena
K01bsu011_u:4: gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmmikasya
K01bsu011_u:5: bodhisattvasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya vāg vijñaptyartha grahaṇāvabodhasamarthasya pādayornnipatyādhyeṣaṇā kāryā /
K01bsu011_u:9: bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛttvā teṣāṃ guṇānāmukhīkṛtya
K01bsu011_u:10: ghanarasaṃ cetaḥprasādaṃ saṃjanayya nīcairjānumaṇḍalenotkuṭukena vā sthitvā tathāgatapratimāṃ
K01bsu011_u:12: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamiti /
K01bsu011_u:14: na cirasyedānī me 'kṣayasyāprameyasya niruttarasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya prāptirbhaviṣyatīti /
K01bsu011_u:16: tena punarvvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvo 'vikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā evaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
K01bsu011_u:17: śṛṇu tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
K01bsu011_u:20: pratīcchasi tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau kṛtapraṇidhāno
K01bsu011_u:21: mamāntikāt sarvvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ
K01bsu011_u:24: yacchīlamanāgatānām bodhisattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
K01bsu011_u:25: yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bhavati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
K01bsu011_u:26: yeṣu ca śikṣāpadeṣu yeṣu śīleṣvatītāḥ sarvvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣitavantaḥ /
K01bsu011_u:30: samanvāharantu māṃ daśadiglokadhānusannipatitā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāḥ /
K01bsu011_u:32: tadanyān vā sattvān samāgamyehajanmanyanyeṣu vā janmāṃ tareṣu mayāpāyaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritamanumoditam
K01bsu011_u:33: vā tat sarvvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāmācāryyasya
K01bsu011_u:34: cāntike 'grayā pravarayā pratideśanayā pratideśayāmi jānan smaran na praticchādayāmi // trirevam //
K01bsu011_u:35: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya āvodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
K01bsu011_u:38: so 'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍadiṣadanāddharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi śāntaṃ virāgāṇāṃ pravaram /
K01bsu011_u:39: so 'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanādavaivarttikabodhisattvasaṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi gaṇāṇāṃ śreṣṭham // trirevam //
K01bsu011_u:40: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyayastriśaraṇagato 'nantasattvadhātūttāraṇāyābhyuddharaṇāya saṃsāraduḥkhāt paritrāṇāya sarvvajñajñāne anuttare pratiṣṭhāpanāya
K01bsu011_u:41: yathā te atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā bodhicittamutpādya buddhatvamadhigatavanto 'dhigamiṣyanti adhigacchanti ca /
K01bsu011_u:42: yathā sarvvabuddhā 'nāvaraṇena buddhajñānena buddh cakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti yathā dharmmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāma(?) nujānanti /
K01bsu011_u:43: tena vidhinā ahamevaṃnāmā evaṃnāmna ācāryyasyāntikāt sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ ca purato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayāmi // trirevam
K01bsu011_u:45: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi yadahaṃ loke aśaraṇe alayane aparāyaṇe 'dvipe trāṇaṃ
K01bsu011_u:51: pratigṛhya ca yathāśakti yathābalam yathājñānaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samāropayāmi /
K01bsu011_u:52: itaḥ prabhṛti yatkiñcit dānaṃ dāsyāmi śīlaṃ rakṣiṣyāmi kṣāṃti saṃpādayiṣyāmi vīryamārabhya
K01bsu011_u:53: dhyānaṃ samāpatsye prajñayā vyavacāryya upāyakauśalyaṃ vā śikṣiṣye tat sarvvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya //
K01bsu011_u:54: uttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya teṣāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikāṇāṃ mahāyāne sāmicīmanupravrajāmi /
K01bsu011_u:55: anupravrajya bodhisattvo 'haṃ bodhisattva iti māmitaḥ prabhṛtyācāryyo dhārayatu // trirevam //
K01bsu011_u:56: tatastenācāryyeṇa tasyāḥ pratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornnipatya sāmicīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam
K01bsu011_u:57: gṛhītamanenaivaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mamaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt yāvat trirapi bodhisatvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
K01bsu011_u:58: sohamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva ātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtaṃ prajānan asyaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasya
K01bsu011_u:59: paramāryyāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvvasattvānāṃ viparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśadikṣvanantāparyyanteṣu
K01bsu011_u:62: evaṃ punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmmasamāptyanantaraṃ dharmmatā khalveṣā yad daśasu
K01bsu011_u:63: dikṣvanantāparyyantesu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ
K01bsu011_u:64: ca bodhisattvānāṃ tadrupaṃ nimittam prādurbhavati yena teṣāmevaṃ bhavati /
K01bsu011_u:65: evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvara samādānaṃ samāttamiti //
K01bsu011_u:67: yadi tairguṇairyuktaḥ pudgalo na sannihitaḥ syāt tato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne vacanīyam
K01bsu011_u:69: ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K01bsu011_u:70: mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
K01bsu011_u:72: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi /
K01bsu011_u:73: teṣāṃ purataḥ sarvvāṇi bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvaṃ ca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade /
K01bsu011_u:74: yacchīlamityādi pūrvvavat yāvat bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti /
K01bsu011_u:75: māmitaḥ prabhṛti buddha bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca dhārayantviti vijñaptiḥ // 0 //
